message: Let's be fair, Bob. A slight advantage for me considering the inflation, but a good deal for both of us to avoid losses.
I think a fair split is closer to 55/45, given that I'm taking the inflation hit this round.  Let's get this done and avoid further losses.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  Every round costs us money.  Take the deal!
